# Deft Hands (Feat)
## Overview
You have exceptional manual dexterity.

**Benefit:** You get a +2 bonus on [[Disable Device (Skill)|Disable Device]] and [[Sleight of Hand (Skill)|Sleight of Hand]] skill checks. If you have 10 or more ranks in one of these skills, the bonus increases to +4 for that skill.

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook 1, pg. 121
